#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
char str[29];
int N; 
struct val 
{
           int t, f;
           val() 
      {    t=0; f=0;
       }
      
};
 
       val f(int start, int end)
   {
         val temp;
        if(start==end)
      {
        if(str[start]=='T')
        temp.t=1;
        else temp.f=1;
        return temp;
      }
        val left, right, total;
        for(int i=start; i<end-1; i+=2) 
      {
        left=f(start, i);
        right=f(i+2, end);
        if(str[i+1]=='.') 
      {    
        total.t+=left.t*right.t; total.f+=left.t*right.f+left.f*right.t +left.f*right.f;
      }
        if(str[i+1]=='+')
     { 
       total.t+=left.t*right.t+left.t*right.f+left.f*right.t; total.f+=left.f*right.f;
     }
        if(str[i+1]=='*')
    {
        total.t+=left.t*right.f+left.f*right.t; total.f+=left.t*right.t+left.f*right.f;
    }
  }
    return total;
 
}
 
int main() {
    scanf("%s", str);
    N=strlen(str);
    printf("%d\n", f(0, N-1).t);
}
